org.sloth.persistence
Interface ObservationDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
ObservationDaoImpl
public interface ObservationDao

Data Access Object for Observation.

Author:
Christian Autermann, Stefan Arndt, Dustin Demuth, Christoph Fendrich, Simon Ottenhues, Christian Paluschek

Method Detail

delete

void delete(Collection<Observation> t)
            throws NullPointerException,
                   IllegalArgumentException
Delete Entities from database. Invoking this method with Entities not known by the database will cause an IllegalArgumentException.

Parameters:
t - the Entities to be deleted
Throws:
NullPointerException - if t or t's content is null
IllegalArgumentException - if Entities are not found in the database.

delete

void delete(Observation t)
            throws NullPointerException,
                   IllegalArgumentException
Delete a Entity from database. Invoking this method with an Entity not known by the database will cause an IllegalArgumentException.

Parameters:
t - the Entity to be deleted
Throws:
NullPointerException - if t is null
IllegalArgumentException - if t is not found in the database.

getAll

Collection<Observation> getAll()
Query for all Entities.

Returns:
all Entities found

getByCategorie

Collection<Observation> getByCategorie(Categorie c)
                                       throws NullPointerException,
                                              IllegalArgumentException
Query for all Observations in a Categorie.

Parameters:
c - the Categorie
Returns:
all Observations in c
Throws:
NullPointerException - if c is null
IllegalArgumentException - if c is not in the database.

getById

Observation getById(Long id)
Query for a Entity with a known id.

Parameters:
id - the id
Returns:
the @code Entity with the specified id, if no matching Entity found null is returned.

getByKeyWord

Collection<Observation> getByKeyWord(String keyword)
                                     throws NullPointerException
Query for Observations matching the given keyword. title and description of both, the Observation and the corresponding Categorie are searched.

Parameters:
keyword - teh keyword
Returns:
a Collection of matching Obseravtions
Throws:
NullPointerException - if keyword is null

getByUser

Collection<Observation> getByUser(User u)
                                  throws NullPointerException,
                                         IllegalArgumentException
Query for all Observations created by a User.

Parameters:
u - the User
Returns:
all Observations created by u
Throws:
NullPointerException - if u is null
IllegalArgumentException - if u is not in the database.

getNewestObservations

List<Observation> getNewestObservations(int count)
Query for the newest Observations. If less then count Observations are available all Observations will be returned.

Parameters:
count - specifies how many Observations will be returned.
Returns:
count or less Observations; orderd by their creationDate
See Also:
Observation.getCreationDate()

save

void save(Observation t)
          throws NullPointerException
Save a Observation in the database. BaseEntity.id will be generated.

Parameters:
t - the Observation to be saved
Throws:
NullPointerException - if t is null

update

void update(Observation t)
            throws NullPointerException,
                   IllegalArgumentException
Update a Entity. Invoking this method with an Entity not known by the database will cause an IllegalArgumentException.

Parameters:
t - the Entity to be updated
Throws:
NullPointerException - if t is null
IllegalArgumentException - if t is not found in the database.
